price: Warri kafaran badiin isaaniif ta’aadha. (Rabbiin) dalagaalee (hojii) isaanii ni balleessa.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَتَعۡسٗا لَّهُمۡ وَأَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū fataʿsan lahum wa-aḍalla aʿmālahum
translations: and He will cause to be lost
